title: CFTC Faces More Pushback From States Over Prediction Markets
description: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is facing more opposition from states over the agency’s bid to be the sole regulator of prediction markets.
content: The Commodity Futures Trading Commission is facing more opposition from states over the agency’s bid to be the sole regulator of prediction markets.
